name: bewarket
overview:
bewarket is a social marketplace within facebook, where people can trade with their friend, neighbors or all the facebook’s network.

This type of online shopping relies on social networks to facilitate business transactions, which makes e-commerce more reliable, friendly and more comfortable to use. People can recommend products to friends, search for sales on a map and rate users. Social Commerce also facilitates resale, in which users sell products from other vendors and automatically earn a percentage on those sales. The combination of features from both social networks with e-commerce means that users can easily donate percentage of their sales to charities, or are just 3 clicks away from exporting their sellerâ€™s information to fan pages and/or websites outside Facebook.
